titleStmt.title: The papists younger brother, or, The vileness of Quakerism detected as it hath been printed and published by themselves : and an appendix of the Quakers unsound faith, which is also gathered out of their own printed books / by Misoplanes and Philalethes.
titleStmt.author: Misoplanes.
Philalethes.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Brewster and Simon Miller,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
